name: Clawed Limbs
effect_text: Unarmed attacks lose the âˆ’2 Fight penalty.

name: Extra Eyes
effect_text: Once per round, reroll a single failed Shoot roll.

name: Warped Nerves
effect_text: Once per round, gain +2 to any one roll, then gain 1 Horror token

name: Regenerative Flesh
effect_text: At the start of this model's activation, if it has 1 or more Wounds remaining, heal 1 Wound. Each time this triggers, roll a Horror test.

name: Elongated Limbs
effect_text: Melee attacks may target enemies up to 1 M away.

name: Psychic Scars
effect_text: Gain +1 Willpower modifier. Start game with 1 Horror token.

name: Monstrous
effect_text: Add +1 Wound and +1 Damage on Melee attacks. The model cannot benefit from Cover.

name: Unstable Physiology
effect_text: Once per game, when reduced to 0 Wounds, remain on the table at 1 Wound instead. Immediately gain 1 Horror token. Allied units within 1 do as well
